snippet: Federal authorities arrested 244 unauthorized immigrants who had previously been convicted of crimes, including violent felonies and sexual abuse.
abstract: Immigration and Customs Enforcement officials take more than 240 illegal immigrants with criminal records into custody during four-day sweep across Southern California.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities arrested 244 unauthorized immigrants who had previously been convicted of crimes, including violent felonies and sexual abuse.

headline.main: 244 Immigrants With Criminal Records Face Deportation in California
headline.print_headline: 244 With Criminal Records Face Deportation in Sweep
